Overall, this is a great purchase and a great price.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: rmc
Reviews.Content: Great Camera and works very well...I received in no time and after looking all over it was the best price...very pleased.

Reviews.Title: OK for starters
Reviews.Author: Simone C
Reviews.Content: Too bad we can't do half stars, it's more of a 3.5. I got this camera for Christmas in Red, I needed a digital camera since breaking my last one. It's good for beginners who just like taking photos, and it's pretty easy to use with the autoshoot option. Once you start playing around with the different modes you do get a better quality picture, and if you click the shutter button once to focus that helps a bit with the blurriness. For about 70 bucks (how much it was at Best Buy) it's ok, next time we will put a few more bucks in for better camera. For the time being I've had no crazy glitches or anything, so it'll do until I save for a big fancy camera.

Reviews.Title: The perfect camera for us.
Reviews.Author: careful shopper
Reviews.Content: This camera was a replacement for one that was stolen while on vacation.(in Canada)  We love everything about it & will make sure this camera is not a victim of a crime.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Erick Sanabria
Reviews.Content: This camera is the best low cost option. Good quality, easy to use, and the best thing: It requires 2AA batteries!

Reviews.Title: OK but not best . would still prefer sony
Reviews.Author: Omkar
Reviews.Content: Great for price.Not user friendly, poor construction, Feels delicate while using it, ok pic. quality. great for gift ( for guests whom you really dont feel like giving gift but have to .. you know what I mean )

Reviews.Title: coolpix
Reviews.Author: bubba
Reviews.Content: 30 days after purchase the camera does not work.  Now I have to try to work somewarenty BS with Nikon.  I will try a Canon camera.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Valentine's day gift
Reviews.Author: LadyLeatherneck
Reviews.Content: It's a good quality camera for a very reasonable price. Has a good battery life. I wish it was less sensitive to movement but otherwise, very good.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price!
Reviews.Author: Hikaroo "hikaroo dot deviantart dot com"
Reviews.Content: I don't think I could go back to not having this camera.It focuses very well, and takes beautiful pictures. Not professional quality, but excellent for snapping pictures on vacation, or of your family.It's compact, and easy to use. The price was perfect!I love it!

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L22 (RED)
Reviews.Author: S. Dancer
Reviews.Content: Got this on sale at the base AFEES and it is a wonderful camera!  Bought it for the inspiring photographer in my 9 yr old, and she loves it!!  Heading back this afternoon to get another for my wife who is tired of her Kodak acting up after two years and really loves the functions of the COOLPIX L22.  Great little camera for the price, does video as well.  Very clear pics and the screen size is perfect!  Software is a hit or miss whether you want to use it or not, but it comes with it none the less.Pick up an SD card while you are at it.  The camera comes with approx 19mb of internal memory, so a 2Gb $10 Sd card will last a while and makes it easier to simply take the card out and drop in the card reader rather than fool with the USB plug and camera to download pics and videos.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Camera
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy for this camera. A Nikon Coolpix L22 12.0MP Digital camera for 69.00 is awesome, J.C. Penny's had the same camera in the newspaper on sale for $169.00....Tried them both as we bought two and they are terrific....Joel

Reviews.Title: Great Codition, Arrived on time
Reviews.Author: frozennipple
Reviews.Content: Arrived way before time, works well, does everything I ask of it.  Good camera for a person who just wants to take good quality pictures, doesn't do anything too fancy though

Reviews.Title: it is sure pretty
Reviews.Author: D. Comb
Reviews.Content: I'm a bit intiidated by this camera. could be that the buttons are so small that either I cannot see it or my fingers are just too big to push without making a mistake. So, a review from me at this time is really not fair. Once I have begun to take pix then I will come back and give you an update ok?

Reviews.Title: Freakin Awesome Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: mr bojangles
Reviews.Content: When I was looking for an affordable digital camera and saw this one, I couldn't get the image of that punk'd guy in the trucker hat out of my head. After I got all my laughing out I decided I'd give it a try. WOW!!!! I can see why he is having a successful career now because the camera is "Freakin AWesoMe"!! Not only does the 12 megapixels deliver a sharp image but I was also surprised that it had a built in microphone and it took phenomenal video footage as well. The facial recognition feature helped me capture fantastic images of my 3 year old daughter and we all know how tough it is to get a kid that's chocolate wasted to stay still and smile for the camera. They provide you with some great software and also the panoramic assist feature worked great for capturing the NY skyline. I'm not one to write reviews of products, but this was the best thing I've purchased in the last year!! Definatly do yourself a favor and get this camera! You will not be disappointed. Overall the price and quality are A++

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: critic
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a birthday gift for someone who wanted to experiment with an easy to use camera. The Nikon Coolpix fit the bill -- and then some. Features are impressive .... the learning curve is easy ... the camera is small and lightweight. The reason I gave the battery life only three stars is because that is an unknown factor at this point, and there is no n/a option. Highly recommended for anyone looking for an outstanding everyday digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice basic camera
Reviews.Author: jnualaska
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my daughter in December. It came in a nice red color that she appreciated. The camera is a good choice for a basic camera. It is easy to use and takes nice pictures and video. Well worth the price and I would recommend it for those not looking for anything too fancy.

Reviews.Title: Cool Flicks
Reviews.Author: Dinnerline
Reviews.Content: I had a really old Nikon Coolpics camera and that is why I wanted a new one. I was already familiar with its basic operations. This camera does everything I need it to do and more.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: Great buy for a starter-up camera (bought for 12 year old). Packing was excellent-neat and clean. Camera was exactly what was advertised and in excellent condition. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: David Glazer
Reviews.Content: I am 57 and am not tech saavy...and even I could figure out how to take photos and upload them to the puter...get the cam on sale...you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot !!
Reviews.Author: Ted Whittaker "meganspapa"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera (for the money) but then I'd expect nothing less from Nikon.  Sharp clear images both indoors and out. Straight forward ease of use, perfect size, hand weight, and more than adequate LCD screen. I love this little camera!

Reviews.Title: One Happy Mother!!!!
Reviews.Author: giltronical
Reviews.Content: this was a great buy; which i bought for my sister who just had her first baby.  It takes great pictures and video. One of the advantages is that it take AA batteries not those special batteries that cost a fortune.

Reviews.Title: Great camera so far.
Reviews.Author: Stevo
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed so far with this camera, especially if it holds up for a long time. I have physically compared this camera to a Canon that costs forty dollars more and found the Nikon was capturing more details which to me means a better lens. The Canon might look better and be more space age, but this Nikon is more intuitive to me and has lots of great features. Easy to use I would definitely say.  I could have easily given five stars as cant really find anything to fault. Bottom line to me with a camera is the level of detail found in pictures.

Reviews.Title: Compact & Simple
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy just a nice, compact camera. I'm still a little old fashioned when it comes to these digital cameras. I don't like the pause in the shutter. I find it hard to keep the camera steady. That's not saying anything bad about this one.

Reviews.Title: Happy customer
Reviews.Author: Debra L Hill
Reviews.Content: Someone else recommended that I should buy this camera, and I did so on their recommendation.  I am very happy with the camera, It is very easy to use and gives me lots of options when taking pictures.  And, it was extremely easy to download the software for downloading pictures to the computer.

Reviews.Title: Love it! (uploaded pics)
Reviews.Author: M. Nash "Nashferatu"
Reviews.Content: The L22 is a great camera for the price. The screen is large, and the options for operation are many. It's starts within 2-3 seconds after turning on for that quick shot. It starts in the same mode you left off with, so be aware of what kind of pictures you were taking when the camera was shut off. The AA battery thing is something to get used to, but think of this: You are out in nature with no electricity to charge the in-house battery. ...well a six-pack of AA's in your pocket will definitley come in handy! Battery life seems to be good, I have yet to really put it to the test (got the camera 2 weeks ago). Video is rather good for such a small camera; the time left to record is on the screen. Buy the SD card!! it only has a 16mb memory, so 4/8/16 GB memory card is a must! I will be posting pics soon...(2 hours later...)I uploaded some pics in the gallery. The ease of use makes this camera suitable for a hobbyist photographer like me. The photos can kind of show what is capable, as well as some of the other photos people have uploaded. For the dropped price to 69 bucks, you can't go wrong.One downside is the camera has to be on when downloading shots, so don't forget to unplug the USB and shut it off - battery waster there.... did I mention to make sure to get a memory card...?! get two!! This camera goes with me everywhere, just in case "the shot" presents itself; 'cause it will be WELL WORTH IT.

Reviews.Title: camra review
Reviews.Author: mathurston
Reviews.Content: I love my camra i carrie it with me everywhere is small enough to fit in a pockit in my hand bag it takes great pics

Reviews.Title: Purse camera
Reviews.Author: deb29
Reviews.Content: Love this camera for my purse.  Compact and easy to use.  The video sound is not quite as loud as it should be, but the video quality is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Pics speak a 1,000 words!!
Reviews.Author: Shoe_Girl "Shoe_Girl"
Reviews.Content: I'm not a camera pro and I do not have super human steady surgeon hands.  The current camera we have at home required x-men stability to take pics of simple non-moving objects.  I bought this because a reviewer had posted a pic they took form a moving vehicle and it was crisp and brilliant.  I wanted something that I could use to take pics without having to freeze time to get good pics. This camera rocks! It's ridiculously simple to use, it runs on easy to get AA batteries, it has a timer, flash features, impecable focus and zooming capabilities and I love that you can have sound to signal shutter and button pushing so you don't have to wonder if it worked or not.  Simply put, if you want a camera that is easy, small, and takes fabulous pics then this is it.  PLUS it's a great great price!! :)

Reviews.Title: Battery cover breaks easily
Reviews.Author: Fake name real review
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my girlfriend two months ago. She has barely used it and has definitely not abused it. Today I took it out the the case and notice that the battery cover is open. The extremely thin piece of plastic that's supposed to hold the latch is cracked and broke off. What a terrible design. This camera was great so far but now its essentially garbage. Do not buy this camera. It will NOT last.

Reviews.Title: poor poor camara
Reviews.Author: BettyH
Reviews.Content: This camara is absolutely waste of money. Picture quality is awful no matter what setting you use it doesn't give you a clear image. I own a canon an old one and it works twenty times better than this one. Totally  desappointed.

Reviews.Title: Battery Life is not very long!
Reviews.Author: Shopaholiks "amazonjunkie"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera but the only problem I have is the battery life. I only used the camera to take pics twice, turning the camera off after every use. The third time I tried to use my camera it did not come on because the battery was too low. I strongly suggest keeping a set of batteries near by when using this camera.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this camera, images are of the poorest quality. Can't believe I bought this
Reviews.Author: D. Payne
Reviews.Content: Please save your money, this is a very disappointing product from Nikon. Buy a Cannon instead, I will go back.

Reviews.Title: nikon
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my boyfriend for our anniversary. I am a photographer personally but he has never had a camera so since hes always borrowing my Nikon coolpix i decided to get a cheaper version of mine since hes still new at it and i think this was perfect, he loves it, its very simple to use,and a great price. Only problem we had was the focusing was a little off but still great and decent.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mr Valentine
Reviews.Content: Thank you again, for fixing the error created by the post office. They lost my first package and This was a birthday gift to my mother. And after two weeks of waiting. You guys took care of me and allowed  me to put a smile on my mom's face. I can't thank you enough for what you guys did. I love amazon!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: KraftyKat
Reviews.Content: So far I've enjoyed the camera I recently purchased.  I did some research before I purchased the camera, but mostly I was looking to replace my old Sony CyberShot with something smaller with a larger screen.  I really like the "idiot proof" nature of the programming.  I'm not too interested in making adjustments like you would with an SLR.  I just need a camera that take consistently good photos of my family and so far, the Nikon fits the bill!

Reviews.Title: battery case cover breaks easily.
Reviews.Author: Bonnievd
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 cameras-  6 months apart, ( one as a gift) and the small battery  case cover latch has broken off of both of them. Luckily the second one  I returned to the store within days for a replacement but I am stuck with tape on my own camera. I now see this is a common complaint with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Decent, but doesn't hold up
Reviews.Author: Wish
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a gift for Christmas and it's been great. However, it eats batteries like crazy and today, for no real reason it just decided to stop responding and says 'battery exhausted' even when given new batteries.Definitely a good choice for a somewhat disposable camera, but don't rely on it overmuch.

Reviews.Title: GOOD BUY FOR THE MONEY
Reviews.Author: JULIE
Reviews.Content: AFTER PURCHASING IT I FOUND IT WAS CHEAPER AT BEST BUY. SO I WAS A LITTLE DISAPPOINTED BUT I DIDN'T HAVE TO FIGHT THE CROWDS SO IT WAS WORTH IT AND ARRIVED IN A TIMELY MANNER

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Marc "Marc"
Reviews.Content: Its not as small as i would like but its not big or bulky by any means. Takes very nice vibrant bright pics. This is the best camera you will find for 70 bucks...

Reviews.Title: STAY AWAY
Reviews.Author: gundsn
Reviews.Content: Camera gives good quality pictures.  BUT two major problems.  (1)The body is poorly built.  The clasp which keep battery compartment closed is made from plastic and it broke with several openings.  The battery compartment no longer stays closed.  (2)The camera eats batteries.  The batteries take maybe 50 pictures before the the "batteries exhausted" message appears.

Reviews.Title: TOTAL DISAPPOINTMENT
Reviews.Author: DEBSPIX
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASED THIS CAMERA WITH GREAT EXPECTATIONS. WHAT A MISTAKE. I HAVE IT NOW ABOUT 3 MONTHS AND HAVE NEVER TAKEN A CLEAR PICTURE. IT SEEMS IF YOU ARE WILLING TO FOCUS THE CAMERA FOR A MINUTE OR BETTER YOU MIGHT GET SOMETHING THAT RESEMBLES A GOOD PICTURE. I NOTIFIED THE COMPANY WITH AN ISSUE REGARDING DOWNLOADING PICTURES AND ERASING THEM FROM MY CAMERA AS ANY CAMERA I'VE HAD ALWAYS GAVE ME THAT OPTION. THE NIKON CUSTOMER SERVICE REP. INFERRED THAT I HAD THE WRONG MEMORY CARD (WHICH I KNOW I DON'T) AND  TOLD ME I COULD RETURN IT FOR REPAIRS AT MY EXPENSE. THAT WAS NOT THE ANSWER I EXPECTED. I OWN AN OLYMPUS DIGITAL CAMERA THAT I HAVE HAD FOR 8 YEARS AND DECIDED TO PURCHASE THIS ONE BECAUSE IT WAS SO MUCH LIGHTER AND EASY TO PLACE IN MY BAG. I WOULD NOT RECCOMEND THIS CAMERA TO ANYONE.

Reviews.Title: no complaints
Reviews.Author: mily24
Reviews.Content: My previous CoolPix L22 fell into the water, and fixing it cost more than replacing it. I received this camera quickly and just as described.  No complaints about the seller or the camera!  I would definitely purchase from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: My boyfriend likes it
Reviews.Author: Kisha
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my man and now he loves it. The only thing I didnt pay attention to before buying this camera was I didnt know it required AA batteries, thats the only thing that bothers me other than that the user manual is very easy to understand and in fact the camera is cool and easy 2 use. I'd recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Kristie Thomas "Kristie"
Reviews.Content: It took me forever to make a decision when it came to buying a camera, I didnt want to spend a lot of money and wanted a good camera with good picture quality. This camera was not it. Dont get me wrong, its a nice little camera but the picture quality is horrible. Everything looks extremely scratchy, and no matter if the flash is on or not, the picture half the time ends up blurry. I will most like send this product back because I am not satisfied with this product for the the 83 dollars I paid for it. I mean my old 6 mega pixel camera had a better photo quality then this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Rodster
Reviews.Content: When I purchased this camera I was looking for a reasonable priced camera that would give me the photo quality I wanted with ease of operation.  This Nikon fills the bill.  For the money I don't believe you could find a better camera.  The pictures are great and it's really simple to use.  I am really pleased with this one.  If the need arises I'll buy another Nikon in the future.

Reviews.Title: COOLPIX
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: We haven't taken a lot of pictures with this camera yet, but my wife has been very happy with the ease of use and size.  The picture quality has been very acceptable.  We had purchased one for our 12 year old grandson, and he had a very fine collection of photos before he lost the camera.  I am sure we would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a good, compact digital camera.  The purchasing experience with Amazon was also top notch.

Reviews.Title: Big Bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Canuta
Reviews.Content: Had this camera (blue one) for a year now and it still performs and looks like new, batteries get 200-350 pics depending how long you use the viewer for reviewing the pics. Quality is great and the smart portrait mode works well when looking for the smiling subjects. As far as the zoom I found it much better to take the picture without zooming in and then use the software on the computer to zoom in and crop it there...pic quality is much better that way. If you remember there is a slight lag then you will get great pics if you hold the camera steady until you hear the click, if you don't then the pics will be blurry. I've taken many shots of buildings from a moving boat in the middle of a river and many of people and scenery from inside a moving car and they turned out pretty sharp and colorful. Outdoor shots are amazing and the movie mode is pretty awesome for a small point and shoot like this. Shadows outdoors can be helped by forcing the flash as a fill in. I recommend trying out the different modes the camera offers so you can see which will work best for your situations, after all you needn't worry about wasting film anymore, so take many pics and you'll surely get a few that will be the awesomes ones you wanna print! I have a regular SLR Nikon I rarely used since getting this one because of the pic quality and the compactness of the camera. Liked it so much I also bought the red one for the kids.

Reviews.Title: happy customer
Reviews.Author: Donaldduvy
Reviews.Content: The camera is small so it is not a burden to carry around for the price I payed for the camera it is doing a wonderful gob of taking pictures. I bought a underwater housing and strobe for the camers and it is giving me very goog results.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the money
Reviews.Author: Ejaz
Reviews.Content: I like the camera, it is worth of money we are spending on.  i dont find any issue, picture quality is also good. and you can take 16:9 aspect photos also.

Reviews.Title: Pleasant to work with
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: This camera is a good buy as it shoots clear pictures and the LCD screen at the back is quite big. Lots of different 'modes' to choose from. One drawback is that it takes a couple of seconds before the camera is ready to take your next photo but hey, for this price it's really a good deal !

Reviews.Title: nixon coolpix
Reviews.Author: katiewoof
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price.  My grandson got this for his 14th birthday and has taken some really good pictures with it.  Easy to use and download pictures from.

Reviews.Title: nikon camera
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: Camera came as indicated. Quality is great and very easy for anyone who is not familiar with digital cameras. Bought for my mom who is not tech savy and she learned how to use it very quickly.

Reviews.Title: Practical
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Pappas "Retired"
Reviews.Content: Was given as a gift to a child and he was thrilled. Was able to post everything online and the social media groups. A happy trooper.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22 Camera
Reviews.Author: H. Weiss
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife, who is not a tech-savvy person, she needs a really user friendly camera. This camera is simple and easy to use, she is able to make use of all of the features of the camera without difficulty. Thank you, Nikon, for making a "quality" camera with many features that can be used by non-technical people.

Reviews.Title: Good simple camera
Reviews.Author: tsirick
Reviews.Content: I'm still getting used to this product, I thought it would be easier to get used to considering I'm fairly savvy, but there's some weird little tricks - like it automatically defaults to a setting that takes bad photos inside - and I can't figure out a way around them.  Otherwise, good photos, good battery life, easy to carry, and some fun functions.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Snowman
Reviews.Content: I find that for the price, this a fantastic camera.Pros - "Easy auto mode" chooses the mode for the best picture and works great most of the time. Good color accuracy when in light. Like 10 seconds from button press to shoot (not bad but not great). Great and smooth video especially good for things like youtube and whatnot. Easy transfer from camera to computer; connect with required cable and then just drag and drop.Cons - It has a hard time getting color correctness on close up shots (especially dark close up shots) and it's a PAIN to take a picture of something more than half a foot in front of you because it REALLY doesn't like to focus in close-up shots. It is possible to take close up shots with good color with this camera but it takes several tries and messing with exposure settings (pretty easy to do but it would be nice if it was automatic). Sometimes it has some trouble using drag and drop and the transfer freezes halfway through and you have to cancel and start the transfer again. It happens randomly but it's just a minor inconvenience.But for like 70 bucks, it's FANTASTIC for your money. I got mine for Christmas and for the hobby photographer or family picture-taker, it's well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: kiki
Reviews.Content: My mom got me this camera for christmas, and I LOVE it. It's cute, compact, and now I can actually take pictures during memorable moments in my last year of college. I

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera
Reviews.Author: Online in Iowa
Reviews.Content: Review written by my 6 year old son, "my camera is the best.  It can take the most pictures on the 16-9 picture taking mode.  When you are pointing at someone a yellow square will appear and it will focus on the face even if you move it somewhere else and the face is still on the screen focused.  You just push this button it's a box with an arrow in it and then you can scroll with the arrow keys which are not basically arrow keys and then you can hold it down and it will go really fast.  And you can put it in sports mode.  I recommend this camera to people who don't have cameras."

Reviews.Title: Very Good Built-in Functions
Reviews.Author: Gary Severance
Reviews.Content: The Coolpix L22 is a 12 MP camera for people who like to take good quality pictures and edit them in the camera and on a computer but are not interested in making complicated camera adjustments. It comes with a USB cable that allows transfer directly from camera to computer, a hand strap, two temporary batteries, computer photo manager software, a quick start booklet, and a CD with detailed operating information.The 3 inch monitor allows an image to be visible even in bright light and in the dark. I took it to the beach on a clear sunny day, and even with the sun shining directly on the monitor, I could see the image clearly.  In the dark the display is brightly lit. There is a selection of several languages for display messages on the monitor. Date and time including time zones can be set. Pictures can be played back so the photo shoot of the day can be observed and edited.There is a one finger zoom control (best for right handed people) on the top right of the camera.  All you have to do is focus and shoot after selecting a zoom size. It has an automatic face recognition feature that puts the face in focus when you point. The camera also allows you to make "movies."The Coolpix has five shooting modes: Easy Auto Mode, Scene Mode, Smart Portrait, Movie, and Auto Mode (more flexible options).  It has a built in flash, self timer, macro setting for close ups, and exposure compensation that brightens or darkens the photo depending on ambient light conditions.You can keep the Coolpix on Easy Auto Mode and use it in most situations. But you can click on many specialty settings in a handy menu by selecting Scene Mode. Examples of these specialty settings include: Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach/snow (the one I used at the beach), Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Copy (black and white), Backlight (for an object in front of a bright background), and Panorama assist.The Coolpix L122 package is designed for quick learning of the camera's function. The Quick Start will get you going, but the detailed information and examples on the CD Manual will make you an expert on the camera in an hour. Once you know all about it, you realize it is the perfect camera for travel. My wife is a tour guide and is usually very busy on trips. She likes to take a lot of pictures and does not have time to make complex camera adjustments. She will be going as a passenger on a trip to China in Spring, and she will be able to use the point and shoot and special settings on the strictly controlled tour.This is an outstanding camera that was shipped on time and arrived in perfect condition. It was offered at a very affordable price. I give it my highest recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Broken camera
Reviews.Author: Bev
Reviews.Content: Began using the camera right away and after a couple of months of enjoying the camera, it has now completey died.  I will go ahead and proceed with a return of this item.

Reviews.Title: It is damaged after _days_ of use
Reviews.Author: Juan Atiaga
Reviews.Content: This camera is ok, it is not the best of all cameras but it does pretty decent pictures and is very cheap.The problem is that it only lasted 3 WEEKS. I turned it on yesterday and the LCD looks damaged! It only displays some white lines. So, I have no camera after less than a month of buying it.Absolutely NOT reliable.

Reviews.Title: Simple, Affordable and Compact!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey John Wyskiel Jr
Reviews.Content: I got rid of my DSLR camera because the girlfriend already had one and the quality on that camera was outstanding. Now, on this little digital, the quality is similar but so much more affordable for what I need it for. Yes, you can do more with a SLR but on this little point and shoot digital, the quality is so good, the options are easy to use and I can take it anywhere knowing that it will work. Sure, it will lack the capable abilities but it gets the job done for what I want to use it for!

Reviews.Title: basic camera
Reviews.Author: katonyaak
Reviews.Content: This camera works fine.  It is worth the price. It's not fancy but is the basic camera for the whole family to use.

Reviews.Title: Good product for a low price
Reviews.Author: Luis Anduze
Reviews.Content: Can budget cameras really be any good? Yes, absolutely. The Nikon Coolpix L22 is solid, well made, easy to use and practical. It's limited in its zoom range, though, and the lack of manual ISO control is a definite drawback

Reviews.Title: It's Great!!!
Reviews.Author: M. Morgan
Reviews.Content: My old camera broke several months ago and while the nikon isn't the camera I truly want, it's a great fill in :)

Reviews.Title: Nikon L22 review
Reviews.Author: teedee
Reviews.Content: Got this camera because wife is somewhat of a technophobe & reviews seemed to indicate it would be good fit.  She likes the simple controls & large LCD screen.  The lag time of the shutter is still a problem with active grandkids as a subject.  Maybe lithium ion batteries will help.

Reviews.Title: Great for a While.......
Reviews.Author: Cynthia A. Thornton
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera but then it started choking on the batteries. It would say 'Battery Exhausted' with even a brand new set or take a couple pics and then say it. I researched it and found out that it does not like Alkline batteries so I switched but it did NOT solve the problem. It's so unrealiable that it's a paperweight now. Bummer!!!!! But it was fun for a while.(UPDATE: 12/26/2010 I changed to Energizer Max batteries and it seems to be working fine now!!! Hooray!!! Now that this issue is fixed I LOVE this camera!! Hope my experience helps someone.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Dominic
Reviews.Content: Great camera! Takes great pics, easy to use interface and the huge screen in the back makes for great pic reviews! I would completely recommend this point and shoot to anyone; take a picture, check it out, laugh, then slide the camera right back into your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Good camera but Action pictures are horrible
Reviews.Author: S. Schleper
Reviews.Content: The main reason I bought this item was to take pictures of my son on the basketball court in his games. The action pictures are horrible. Everything is blurry, and I do not like the triple picture feature it has. It takes three pictures back to back and then I end up deleting all three anyway. I was VERY disappointed with the action photos. The still pictures are very good quality and the video is great quality. I will keep this camera to use more as a mini video recorder, but I am going to have to buy a different camera for the sporting events. SO... as long as you are not wanting to take action pictures, this is a really good camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: CuTE little camera (but pictures DO come out blurry when there is no flash on)
Reviews.Author: ThereSA
Reviews.Content: I love this camera it's grown on me! and I would suggest for any newbie to digital cameras to get this oneThe only thing Id have to say about it would be about the color blue of the camera I thought it would be brighter it looks real bright on-line but it's kind of a darker deep blue in person If I would have known it was so dark I would have just got black so anyone looking for a bright color go with the primary red and another PrO/cON would be the fact that it takes batteries now this would be good for somebody on the go not having time to charge the camera but batteries could be expensive and just the regular double AA batteries wont do it...I called beach camera and asked if this was supposed to happen or if I just got a defect and he said this happens with this camera cause its battery powered and then he suggested to get the LITHUIM BATTERIES which work great !!! I had them in my camera for two days and no problem or "battery exhausted" yet so far I like this little camera oh and it takes good pictures too and has a lot of picture options even black and white and any questions you have go to the nikon website and they'd be happy to answer them(happy with the choice I made)ok so I have had the camera for a good two months and like someone has mentioned before the pictures do come out blurry sometimes ,like when there is no flash on so just keep the flash on and youll have good pictures

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Lorri A. Harper
Reviews.Content: I expected more.  The focus seems slow, the lighting is distorted even when you change to indoor shot exposure.  The lag is irritating.  I wish I hadn't purchased this camera.

Reviews.Title: battery door broke right away.
Reviews.Author: ueas
Reviews.Content: I usualy like nikon coolpix cameras. This one has a chincy battery door lock. It broke right away. Still closes but doesnt lock.

Reviews.Title: Good camera; nice quality, and somewhat stylish;
Reviews.Author: BK BAZHE "writer, poet, & artist."
Reviews.Content: It works as described; nice; easy to take it anywhere;It is not for professionals, just for ones, regular photographers,who take everyday pics of everything and anything,and all that, etc.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: love this camera! despite negative reviews, I thought this was a great camera for the money. went to hawaii and ended up with over 1000 pictures that were all fantastic - even when I wasn't able to hold the camera stillused it for snorkeling and it worked great! theres a little lag on shutter time, but this didn't stop it from taking excellent pics

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Cinnamon Bennett "vryclever"
Reviews.Content: I desperately needed a new camera and I wanted one that is easy to use and takes great pictures. This camera is great for me. It is simple to use and takes great pictures. The only thing about it that I noticed right away is that it does not have a viewfinder, just the screen. For me this is not a big deal so overall I love my new camera!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for, I guess?  But, i wish I hadn't wasted my money
Reviews.Author: Amy H. Rose
Reviews.Content: Maybe we got a bum one, but I HATE this camera and wish I would have just saved up the money for a slightly better one.  But, the reviews were good, so we went ahead and got it when I saw it on sale for $99.99. It takes AWFUL indoor pics.  AWFUL! They are almost always blurry. And, any pics I take past dusk are also horrible.  I have tried every setting and can't find one that works well inside.  Our prior camera was a 7MP Kodak X740 which took AMAZING pictures for a point and shoot.  The flash broke about 6 months ago, so we wanted something cheapy to use inside since we couldn't really use the Kodak inside anymore.  Well, this was a total waste for us since it takes such bad indoor pictures.  If anyone has any advice on which setting I should try, I'll take it, but I haven't found a single one that works well.  I only gave it a 3 out of 5 because it is cheap, so I really shouldn't have expected more.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera, lcd died after 5 months, good Nikon service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Philos"
Reviews.Content: I use this camera to take quick photos. It's decent; nothing spectacular. The LCD screen died after five months. I contacted Nikon's service center and they instructed me to send it to them for repair. It was still covered by Nikon's warranty so I didn't have to pay anything other than postage to get the camera to them. They sent it back after a little over a week and the thing works fine again. I hope it stays that way.February 16, 2011. This camera was returned to me after having been repaired by Nikon. A couple of weeks later, the new LCD that they installed turned blurry and the camera simply cannot be used. The photos are also blurred. I'll be sending it back to Nikon for more repairs. Luckily, it's still within the 1 year warranty period. Still, I may have gotten a lemon.

Reviews.Title: My Nikon Coolpix L22
Reviews.Author: Aradruin
Reviews.Content: This little camera is a great size for carrying around in a purse or pocket.I have found it to be really easy to use and perfect for people who just want a point and shoot camera, but are still looking for something that takes good quality pictures. The camera comes set to the auto focus/smart picture mode, which I didn't like much because it made the camera so fussy about pictures. So I set the camera to the regular picture taking mode and like it so much better that way.

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend this camera
Reviews.Author: Michal
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, I too was impressed by the popularity and number of 5-star reviews this camera received on Amazon.If you do choose to buy this camera take into consideration:1) This camera has a short battery life.2) Photos are rarely in focus when taken not in broad daylight.3) You cannot set "flash off" as default setting, so if you want it off you have to set it each time you turn on the camera and usually miss the shot you wanted.4) Focusing takes a long time and sometimes the camera doesn't manage to focus at all.The up side is that the camera is cheap, the video feature is nice and the color is pretty.I would recommend getting a different camera.

Reviews.Title: feedback
Reviews.Author: Germán
Reviews.Content: Good vendor.Product delivered before schedule.Product: Easy to use, with rechargeable batteries works for a long time, it is a good compromise for the price.

Reviews.Title: Buy something else!
Reviews.Author: S. Harris
Reviews.Content: My sister and I both have the Nikon Coolpix and neither of us like these.  My husband and I are extremely disappointed with this purchase and we thought we were getting a high quality camera being that it is from Nikon.  The camera doesn't focus right.  The conditions have to be asbolutely perfect for the camera to simply take a picture.  We have to change the settings constantly, in between pictures just to try to find one that works decent. It'll work fine one second and then when you try to take a second picture of the same pose, suddenly it has to be reset.  It is so frustrating!  It takes so long to take just one picture! The settings have to be absolutely perfect for each picture just for it to turn out mediocre.  I have resorted to using my mobile phone as it takes better quality pictures!  We are going to purchase another Kodak EasyShare-quality is so much better and the camera is much easier to use, not to mention the price is better too! My sister was told to avoid the Coolpix but she tried it anyway because she liked the look of the Coolpix, now she wishes she would of listened to her Photograghy Professor and chose something different. Please save your frustration and buy something else!

Reviews.Title: What a camera for <$100
Reviews.Author: Sonal
Reviews.Content: Would have never expected such kind of picture quality from a less than $100 camera. Excellent buy and some of you might never consider gettigna SLR after getting this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: jennifr80
Reviews.Content: This is my second Nikon camera.  The first one I had for 5 years and it worked great, so I wanted another Nikon.  The Coolpix L22 is great, especially for the price.  I'm not into photography or anything, just taking pictures on vacations, at events, holidays, etc., and I love it, small, lightweight, easy to use and excellent picture quality!  Delivery was quick and easy, came earlier than expected and at the time I purchased the camera, early October 2010, it was the cheapest around...even cheaper than Wal-Mart!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Camel2013
Reviews.Content: The ordering process was very easy and the camera actually was delivered before the computer stated that it would. Amazing. The service was wonderful!!!

Reviews.Title: the product is the same in the picture!
Reviews.Author: copalolita
Reviews.Content: the item has a wonderful colorworking is very good,excelent and to use is easywithout manual and you select the language you preferthe delivery was very fast(lasership),tk-u

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Granny-E
Reviews.Content: Just right for not-very-technical Granny.  It's neat and easy to handle, and way more clever than I am, so I can take great pics while I'm learning!

Reviews.Title: All you need to get started
Reviews.Author: Bobby Radford "FoodBankMgr"
Reviews.Content: For features and price, you will not find a better camera.It would make a nice Christmas gift for someone interestedin beginning photography.It surpassed my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Nikon L22
Reviews.Author: Rane
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera with a lot of good features especially it's editing capability. You could actually pick a person from a group photo and make a close-up and save it. This low price camera has a lot of good features that you won't find in expensive cameras. Also, it runs on 2 AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera.
Reviews.Author: P. Castillo
Reviews.Content: I replaced my older Nikon with this one and I am very satisfied. The only thing that I don't like is the fact that you have to go into the menu to use the video, but other than that it's awesome. I especially love the sports mode, gets a pic every second, very cool!

Reviews.Title: L22
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: I bought this because it is easy to use and small enough to fit into a shirt pocket which will be invaluable assets when I travel overseas. I preferred this compact camera to an SLR because this gives me great pictures without the nuisance of a bulky camera which has multiple features I would never use.

Reviews.Title: coolpix is cool
Reviews.Author: mouse 34 "cm"
Reviews.Content: I've used this camera very frequently since I purchased it. Batteries are lasting, and it was easy to use. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: M. Jackson
Reviews.Content: These days there are so many choices for digital cameras. For the money, this camera is an excellent value.  The pictures were of good quality and the camera is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22
Reviews.Author: pepr37
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures for a camera in this price range.I bought this camera for my wife because she wanted a simple to usecamera that takes good pictures and boy it does.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal, Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: kelseycrew
Reviews.Content: I originally bought an older model Coolpix camera for my teenage son.  It was a great camera until his 5 yr. old brother pounded on the lens to get it to go back in.  This L22 12.0 MP was his replacement.  We trust the quality from Nikon and have been pleased with the Coolpix cameras.  My Canon camera was $300+ and this camera takes just as good of pictures for a lot less money.  The price from Amazon was unbeatable so I bought 2 and gave one to my other teenage kid.  I highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Bethzaida Crespo "Beth Crespo"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. It has features that my last camera didn't have. Has more megapexels and more resolution for a low price.

Reviews.Title: Awsome camera
Reviews.Author: Pecantan
Reviews.Content: This camera is worth the money and takes great pic's you will not be disappointed.....

Reviews.Title: A great point and shoot for a low price
Reviews.Author: C. W. Fetter
Reviews.Content: I was traveling in Europe and in a moment of madness set my camera down and did not keep an eye on it. For some reason in ran away (along with my rain jacket).In some ways it was liberating traveling without a camera. While everyone else was trying to take a picture of Rembrandt's Night Watch, I could actually study the painting without distraction (other than all the other folks who were trying to take a photo without flash). Moreover, I did not want to spend time trying to find a camera store. In addition, I did not want to end up with a camera with a rechargeable battery that used a European or British end plug.Fortunately, when I was in York, UK, I walked by a large electronic store in the old town. I asked if they had a camera that takes AA batteries, and behold they produced a Nikon Coolpix L22. The price was about US $100.I found the camera easy to fit in my pocket to keep it safe. The Nikon system has a number of point and shoot modes. It is very basic and would not suit a serious photographer. I also have a Pentax Digital SLR, which is a lot to carry if all you want are some basic photos of your trip. I have only viewed the photos on my computer and most look sharp. I tried a lot of the various shooting modes, resulting in some poorly exposed photos if I used an improper mode.All in all I am pleased. It is a better camera (more megapixels) than the one that was stolen. I would have paid more for a camera with more user controls for exposure, so long as it used AA batteries. Unfortunately very few AA battery cameras are being sold anymore.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Cicindelidae
Reviews.Content: I needed a replacement for a much older (2003) Nikon Coolpix model.  It has very similar menus and functions, so it was easy to adapt to, great image quality (compared to my previous model) and I'm happy with the size, as well as the fact it takes SD cards (as opposed to the CF cards).

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22 12MP
Reviews.Author: John R. Taylor
Reviews.Content: This camera is much better than my former nikon l5. It's smaller, has more features and shoots great videosThe menu system is somewhat of a labyrinth, it takes time to learn.The shutter lag is somewhat high and it seems to go through batteries faster than my old camera.I think it is an excellent value for the price, however.

Reviews.Title: Nikon L22
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera. I bought it for my wife after her Kodiak Easy Share failed. It's easy to operate, takes excellent pictures and fits easily into her pocketbook.

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal on a great product
Reviews.Author: NDRDLR "Handy Man"
Reviews.Content: This is one of the last point and shoot cameras that still uses AA batteries. I actually had a couple other Nikon's in mind for my wife, but when I found out that an extra battery was $65, that did it for me. When we travel, the best option is to carry extra rechargeable AA batteries. I own a Nikon P50 that still has a view-finder, which is great when taking outdoor pics where glare is an issue. Even though the Coolpix L22 has no view-finder, it's still a great point and shoot for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Adams
Reviews.Content: This camera offers a great combination of primo Nikon optics and easy operation. Love the macro feature!

Reviews.Title: great little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: B. Drueke
Reviews.Content: while I didn't get the camera from amazon, I must say that I LOVE this little thing. My mom bought it for me because I recently moved from Atlanta, Georgia to Provo, Utah and needed a camera. I was able to take crystal clear pictures even while driving at 70 mph (the speed limit becomes 75 on I-80 from Lincoln, NE onwards)!!! Some of the pictures you can't even tell they were taken by a point and shoot, even with me driving.  Feature wise, I haven't really played around with it so it's all on auto, the flash doesn't wash the picture out at all. Easy to hook up to the computer and transfer the photos. The camera has a nice "auto-sleep" function that turns the camera off after 3 secs, you can change the timing or turn the feature off. It does take about 5 seconds for the camera to wake-up/turn on (I missed a couple of good shots because of this). The digital zoom gets in nice and tight and remains clear, the optical zoom gets fuzzy and shakey even with the anti-shake feature turned on. The buttons are perfectly placed (I have smallish hands) for easy use.Other than the slowish turn on/wake-up time, I love the camera. But what do you expect, it's a Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix  L22 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Peterson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Nikon Camera when my old one (only 6 months) LCD display screen broke.  Nikon would not warranty the screen replacement so I could purchase a new camera for less than to fix the old one.  I was originally going to purchase another brand of digital camera but Amazon had such a good deal I could not say no.  This camera itself is easy to use.  Quality of the LCD screen is only ok, quite grainy.  The speed to take pictures if also slow, not as good as the old camera.  Last item, I wish it came with a lithium battery, but no luck.  Overall an okay camera, but check around on the price.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use camera...
Reviews.Author: E. Brueckmann
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price... bought it for a Birthday gift and was very pleasedwith the impression it made.Can't go wrong with Nikon !

Reviews.Title: The camera that makes the photos look like pro's
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Rifanburg
Reviews.Content: This camera makes it so easy to take great pictures and at a great price.I would recommend this camera for adults or children.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix L22 12.0MP
Reviews.Author: reviewit
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It is well priced and very easy to use.  The automatic settings allow you to take photos like a pro! Love it!

Reviews.Title: I picked the right one!
Reviews.Author: Walter
Reviews.Content: My old digital camera had died so I needed a new one. I searched the web but was left confused, they all sounded so good! Some how I decided on the Nikon L22 and have not regreted it. This camera is so easy to use that I still have not read the instructions.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Emornil "Bela's Mom"
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my mom. She loves it. It is very easy to use. And the image quality is super. My mom and her friends used several cameras to take pictures for same scenes. It turned out this camera got the best pictures. My mom was very proud of it.

Reviews.Title: Nice, crisp images
Reviews.Author: K. Mueller
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. My previous camera didn't take the best pictures but it was cheap and I carry it with me all the time. We were going on vacation and the price was too good to pass up. This camera even takes good pictures from the back of a motorcycle!I recommend it highly. It is easy to use and compact.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Scores Again
Reviews.Author: David Johnson
Reviews.Content: Great quality in a small package.  Nikon has proven once again that you don't have to pay a lot for a great product.  This camera has a simple menu structure, intuitive functionality, and takes great pictures.  For any non-technical person who is just looking for a simple camera that takes excellent pictures, this is the one.  It is simple enough to use without any instructions, but the PDF user manual that comes with the camera is very helpful in getting the most out of this camera.  Cost is not the highest item on my priority list, but it is worth mentioning that this camera cost the least of all comparable competitors.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Lydia Blochowiak
Reviews.Content: This Camera is perfect if you want great pictures without alot of complications or gadgets.It has a few buttons and it is simple to use.I wish I would have purchased this Nikon Coolpix L22 when it first came out.Im tired of all the other name brand digital cameras that have way too many features.With this camera you only need to read the manual once and your set to go.I also love the fact that it uses standard batteries and I don't have to charge it.It does not come with a memory card so I would recommend purchasing one with at least 4gb.It arrived when promised and in perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: New camera means better pictures
Reviews.Author: karma
Reviews.Content: The Nikon Coolpix L22 Digital Camera is a great buy.  Low priced and high quality.  I couldn't be happier with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great everyday camera
Reviews.Author: D. Wright "oldguy606"
Reviews.Content: My Coolpix L22 goes everywhere with me. It's small enough to fit in a pocket,and with 12Mp I can crop and enlarge more of the photos.I love the size and for some reason more of my photos are really sharp.

Reviews.Title: Pixel Problem on Display Screen 2 cameras in a Row
Reviews.Author: R. Veenstra
Reviews.Content: Purchased to replace a Kodak gone bad previously had a Casio. I like the Nikon and the fact  that it takes AA vs specialty batteries. The issue with the first camera and the second one amazon shipped is that the nice 3" display screen has a problem with pixels not following in the picture taking mode. The photos are fine but when you have a dark background you have a white spot on your screen. The first camera has it in the middle very annoying the second near the top less annoying they never change positions. I like the features and picture quality vs price so that I am willing to try a third unit. Both cameras came shipped in their display box in a thin plastic envelope.  The problem could be related to the abuse during mailing. As others have mentioned you can not set the ISO manually but the camera has enough specialty modes that you can adapt. It also has an easy auto mode where someone whose camera knowledge only goes as far as disposable cameras can use it, turn it on and press the button, it decides what works best. I think this camera is a great deal hopefully the third time will be the charm. otherwise 3 strikes it's out.Nikon Coolpix L22 12MP Digital Camera with 3.6x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Silver)Amazon was reluctant to ship a third and offered a 20% discount or full refund.I opted for the 20% because I can live with the problem or send it to Nikon for repair if it annoys me later. A great deal even without the 20% discount. The Pixel problem is only noticable with a dark background.

Reviews.Title: Nikon L22
Reviews.Author: Troxman
Reviews.Content: I had no problems with delivery, in fact the package arrived 2 days early. The camera (with Ikelite housing) is going to be a nice asset to my business as we take many underwater photos for the projects we do. The vibration reduction feature is an added bonus, as it is hard to find a solid platform while diving, to take your shots. So far I am very pleased with the overall outcome.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, LOVE this Camera!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Janucik
Reviews.Content: Just for taking pictures of family and friend events, and I've discovered the video feature. The picture quality is amazing! I'm very pleased with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: gatorbait12
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use with a decent amount of features. It has HD picture quality and was a great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: NIKON COOLPIX L22
Reviews.Author: GERARDO49
Reviews.Content: WHEN YOU PUT A PAIR OF RECHARGECHABLES BATTERIES, YOU GOT NO LIMITS. THE CAMERA IS EXELENT, GREAT PICTURES, GREAT QUALITY, AND THE VIDEO SECTION OF IT IS EXEPTIONAL. WHEN YOU BUY THIS PRODUCT YOU WILL BE MORE THAN PLEASED WITH YOUR SELF, YOU WILL BE IN AN OTHER LEVER OF SATISFACTION. IT'S EASY TO USED AND TO UNDERSTAND. SO EASY A KID CAN WORK WITH IT. GREAT PRODUCT.Nikon Coolpix L22 12.0 MP Digital Camera with 3.6x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red-primary)

Reviews.Title: WOW!!! I love this camera!!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Perez
Reviews.Content: The only thing I wanna say is.....I love this camera!!Great for any moment of your life.One of the BEST DIGITAL CAMERAS....EVER!Get it NOW!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: We use this camera as a carry with to grab off hand photos, and it does a great job, pixs are clear and color good. I can not comment on the movie capabilities and have not thus far taken many dark indoor shots, but none of the shots we have taken are throwaways. We would recommend this camera to a friend

Reviews.Title: Nikon L22
Reviews.Author: Jac
Reviews.Content: This is a great litte camera for the price, snap 'n shoot, easy to use & great pic's... buy it!

Reviews.Title: It's a Lemon!
Reviews.Author: A. graham
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera for my daughter. I thought I couldn't go wrong with a Nikon. Big mistake. After about a month it stopped turning on. I took it in for service and they replaced it. The new (reconditioned) camera worked for about 6 months then it wouldn't turn on. Back in for service. The "fixed" it. It was good for about another 2 months then the same thing. I had that camera in and out of the shop for 2 years until it's extended warrenty finally was up - and now it is dead for good.  If you want a good camera - get a Fuji. I use and abuse a Fuji Finepix everyday for work. It has NEVER failed me or been in the shop in 5 years! It is bigger than the Nikon - but does so much more.

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: baddreamgirl
Reviews.Content: I was a camera specialist at a major department store. When I sold this camera it always came back. Its one thing or another with this camera. Just a warning. I wouldn't normally say this because every product is bound to have a lemon, but I am not kidding you every one of these cameras I saw back within a week.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22
Reviews.Author: Susan A. Haugh "Susan Haugh"
Reviews.Content: Ordered after reading all good reviews.  My first digital camera.  Have taken a few pics, but have not printed any.  Seem to be good quality.  One thing I am disappointed about and VERY upset - there is no written owner's manual - just a CD!  I personally cannot sit in front of a computer monitor and read 148 pages and try to learn how to use this camera.  I have talked to three people at Nikon and everyone tells me that there is no manual available.  If I have problems I should just call a CSR at Nikon and they will help me.  Can you imagine being on a cruise and having to call Nikon because you don't understand something?  I bought this camera for a special occasion and vacation and I have no owner's manual to take with me.  This makes no sense to me or anyone I have told about this problem.  Also, there is no memory card with this camera.  I was told by Nikon that's because they don't manufacture Memory cards.  Then why do other models of Nikon cameras come with a memory card?

Reviews.Title: Bad Quality
Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera in December 2010 and it won't take any battery, every batter that we put in it, we'll be lucky if it lasts two full days even though they're brand new batteries and work in everything else other than this camera. I paid over $100 it should have lasted a life time and now what can I do?? Eat the money and consider it a lost?? How about a replacement?? Yea not likely 8 months later.

Reviews.Title: don't get it even if it's free
Reviews.Author: asante2007
Reviews.Content: worse camera ever. The delay between shots is unbelivable and when you finally take the pictures, they come out blurry. the camera has no focus. piece of junk. don't get it even if they are handing them out for free.

Reviews.Title: Broken Battery door lach
Reviews.Author: paula
Reviews.Content: The battery door latch broke when I replaced the batteriesand Nikon will not fix the camera. This was the second set of batteries and the camera is only 2 months old. Nikon service basically said I did not know how to replace the batteries and broke the door latch.This is a very simple process to replace the batteries and thecamera worked for a few pictures after I replaced the batteriesthen the door flew open and would not stay closed because thelittle Plastic latch hook broke off. We have been replacing batteries for our previous camaras for more than 10 years in the exactly the same way but never had one broken.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING camera...
Reviews.Author: Douglas F Wilson
Reviews.Content: I bought this to supplement my big Nikon DSLR, and it does a wonderful job. Did you know that Nikon is the only manufacturer that uses ground glass lenses in their pocket cameras ?? The rest use cast plastic. IT MAKES A DIFFERENCE !!I am very impressed with its' features and extreme ease of use. If I'm in the car with the camera beside me and I see a subject I want to photograph, it takes less than 5 seconds to get the pic.The L22 is an incredible value.Doug in Montana

Reviews.Title: Nikon Color-pik
Reviews.Author: Buzz Carocci
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this camera.  Some other reviews had bad pic's, handling, etc.... Have not had any issues whatsoever and my daughter is taking a zillion pic's with it with no problems.

Reviews.Title: PIECE OF CRAP - LENS ERROR, BRUTAL CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: Sharon E. Hurley "Sharon E. Hurley"
Reviews.Content: I NEVER EVEN GOT TO SEE WHAT KIND OF PICS THIS TAKES AS IT NEVER OPENED - "LENS ERROR AND AS IT WAS A GIFT I HAD NO RECEIPT, MAILED IT TO CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THEY WANTED $100.00 TO FIX IT EVEN THOUGH THEY COULD TELL ME THAT IT HAD NEVER BEEN USED???????? CRAP - WILL NEVER BUY A NIKON AGAIN JUST BECAUSE OF THE CUSTOMER SERVICE

Reviews.Title: Nikon Camera Coolpix L22
Reviews.Author: GrammaChex
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my sister - as she loves the one I own.  VERY easy to use, great pictures and lots of options, including movie function.  I wish they charged a little more for the product and included a SD card.  You will have to purchase the card separately.  I bought it for a Christmas gift and if I had realized this, I would have purchased the card in advance.  We had her open it first so she could take photos of the gift opening - and the camera without the card only holds about 4 pictures!  Great value for the  price and very compact for carrying anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mom in PA
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 71 year old father.  He needed a camera that would help with his unsteady hands.  This does the job.  The pictures come out clear and he loves the ease of using the camera.  It was easy for him to understand and work it right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift.
Reviews.Author: A mom
Reviews.Content: Our daughter loved getting this for Christmas.  She downloaded all the info on her laptop and went immediately into taking pictures.  The only thing was that it didn't include a memory card.  Had to take one out of one of our cameras.  Other than that, she picked it up quickly and is enjoying using it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing for a Nikon
Reviews.Author: photolover
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas. The first thing I noticed when we started using it is that is doesn't have a stabilization feature and if the photographer moves at all the photo is fuzzy. I have a Lumix by Panasonic, and the photos are much better quality overall.

Reviews.Title: Camera more competent than user
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take quick photos of the Grand children.  It is a little more advanced than I thought.  Instead of only AUTO, it has 2 different AUTOs and a whole raft of portrait settings.  Use them or not, it will still allow for the quick snap shot by remembering last settings.  I'm happy with it because it easily fits in my pocket, so I carry it more often.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: jan
Reviews.Content: I had this same camera before, but accidently damaged it.  I was so pleased with it, that I bought another one, this time from Amazon merchant.  The price was good, very competitive, and the product is perfect.  The only problem with this camera is that the automatic focus must be turned on before taking pictures.  Sometimes this is a "time" problem when capturing images of grandchildren who move very quickly!!  It does a beautiful job once this feature is activated, and the pictures are clear, sharp, and very good.  It is compact, and does not "eat" batteries like some digital cameras.  It is very easy to use when traveling, and I would purchase it again should it become necessary.  Actually, I already DID purchase it a second time!  Very happy with Amazon purchase and with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Ed Baker
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews before buying this camera and thought it was a good one. But the picture quality was poorer then my 7.1 MP Canon. The lighting was all blown out and the video quality was really noisy. Already sent this one back.Back to the drawing board.

Reviews.Title: Don't expect to catch those "photo moments"
Reviews.Author: MR "MR"
Reviews.Content: Camera is ok--nice and small.  I liked that it used AA batterries and thought it would be useful for traveling abroad.It has ruined a great number of potentially wonderful photos because you have to hold the shutter down forever and the picture comes out blurry if you move the slightest bit.  Save your money and buy something reputable with image stabilization.Highly dissappointing--and I now don't have the money for a camera that actually takes decent "snap" shots.  This camera specializes in SSSLLLOOOWWW shots.  Don't buy it.

Reviews.Title: Terribly Disappointed
Reviews.Author: k2m1f3
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a Christmas gift. Luckily the person I bought it for began to use it right away. Shaky pictures in spite of the anti-shaking feature. Takes way too long to take pictures. The shutter speed is super slow. As he was taking pictures with this Nikon, I was taking pictures with my Cannon and I took literally double or triple more pictures than he did with the Nikon. Terribly disappointed. I trust the Nikon name but this camera is just not worth it. Now I feel cheap for getting something so unreliable. I am sticking to Cannon.

Reviews.Title: good little camera, but miss viewfinder see revised review
Reviews.Author: Don S. Rule "vettefool"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace a 4 year oldCannon that died. (seems like a short lifespan ).  I really have not had a chance to test it out completely but I can tell you I really miss the viewfinder. focusing looking at the screen sucks, will be worse outside in the sunlight, and the lack of a written complete operating manual is frustrating. just more cost cutting I guess. The camera takes excellant photos and will work out ok for snapshots. the small size is  a plus .update Feb/ 2011  this camera sucks. takes forever to focus, flash only works intermitently. find another brand of camera. there has to be better choices.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy. . .
Reviews.Author: C. Naffier
Reviews.Content: This camera looks good, but that's about where the quality ends.  You get what you pay for, and this is an attractive price.  2 weeks into use, the zoom stopped working, the batteries (fresh) were not readable, and the camera intermittently loses all functionality.It's not that I expect great photographic quality in a camera for my sons. . . but I do expect it to actually work.Not recommended.

Reviews.Title: Bad picture quality.  Eats batteries.  Takes forever to focus.
Reviews.Author: alphaenergy
Reviews.Content: Bad pictures quality in both auto and manual modes.  Takes a long time to focus, and even then, the pictures are not sharp (with steady hands or tripod and green center brackets).  Eats AA batteries like crazy.  My old Nikon L11 camera is a whole lot better.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix Nikon
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Handy have looked for a while best price for a 12 mpsmall but big on features

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sheila Stickell "Bandie's Mom"
Reviews.Content: This camera is so easy to use. It has many options to use for the perfect picture.

Reviews.Title: Bad Warranty
Reviews.Author: Mtnmom
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in March so I could have a nice point and shoot to go along with my Canon 30D.  I used the camera once then placed inside a camera bag.  In June, we were going to my daughters graduation and brought along both cameras.  We used the Nikon before the ceremony and then placed it inside the camera bag and then inside the Canon camera bag (for ease of carrying).  The Canon camera bag is a large backpack style bag with padded individual compartments for the different lens...my point... the Nikon was really protected.  We pulled the camera out to shoot some photos after the ceremony and the LCD screen was blurry.  I sent the camera back to Nikon to fix and they stated the LCD screen is not covered under warranty.  It would be $85 to fix.  I am extremely displeased with the warranty as well as the product.  I know the camera was protected and did not get crushed or damaged by us as Nikon states.  I strongly recommend looking at another camera as well as another brand with a better warranty.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amber Justus
Reviews.Content: We recieved our camera today.  My 13 year old son started taking pictures of some of our flowers.  They turned out beautiful.  I am very impressed with this camera!!

Reviews.Title: batteries in right, won't turn on???
Reviews.Author: kariS
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking it would be just as wonderful as what the other reviews described it as. I inserted the batteries given in the correct way, yet the camera will not turn on. It is defective, and I will never order an electronic from Amazon.com again!!!

Reviews.Title: Horrible customer service from Nikon
Reviews.Author: Timothy M. Rand "Xela"
Reviews.Content: After less than one year of of owning this camera with gentle use (always replacing it in a camera case), the battery compartment door tab broke.  I called Nikon and they led me to believe it would be repaired under warranty if I mailed it in.  Then I received a bill for nearly the price I paid for the camera if I wanted it repaired.  They claimed "impact damage" (that did not occur).  When I called back to ask if they could comment on why they misled me about the warranty, they only said, "It's impact damage and that voids the warranty."  I noticed in these reviews that another customer had the same problem.It's too bad as this unit took great pictures.  Nikon lost this customer!

Reviews.Title: USED is not NEW
Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: I have to admit I was highly upset when I opened the box of the camera and there were huge scratches on the finish of the camera as well as the lens and screen.  It was promptly shipped back the next because I refuse to pay for a damaged/used camera when I was under the assumption it was to be new.  I will NOT order from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Another battery latch problem
Reviews.Author: A book reader
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera in Dec 2010.  It has worked great but then, as others have also reported, the battery latch broke (in Sep 2011). I figured it would be covered under the warranty so I sent it in to their Melville, NY facility for repair. However, Nikon are trying to wriggle out of fixing it for free under the warranty (they want $76) by claiming that the battery latch must have been broken by misuse/abuse/accident.  The warranty states that the only part not covered are the actual batteries themselves - it says nothing about excluding the battery latch from warranty repair.  The camera was not dropped or otherwise abused - the battery latch broke while I was replacing the batteries.  It should last longer than 9 months.  They don't seem to understand the idea that a battery latch may be broken simply because it was defective. I appealed to a supervisor today who said they will review my case and get back to me via email in 24-48 hours. This camera is worth 4 or 5 stars for quality of picture but I can give it only 1 star due to the battery latch failure combined with Nikon's reluctance to honor their 1 year warranty.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera surgeons or bomb squad members
Reviews.Author: Plainshow
Reviews.Content: This camera is subject to one fatal flaw.  The shutter speed is a back-breaker.  At first I thought it was just a matter of lighting and I could change the settings or mode to find something that would help.  After months of playing around with each adjustable setting and talking at length with Nikon customer support, I still am unhappy.  The pictures that are not blurry are good, nice contrast and minimal red-eye, but most times all I get are images that would give Salvador Dalí a headache.  It is a good size, lightweight, and has a user friendly menu system.  Be advised to avoid this camera.

Reviews.Title: NADA QUE ENVIDIAR A OTRAS CAMARAS MAS CARAS
Reviews.Author: Francisco Castillo "Francisco Castillo"
Reviews.Content: FACIL, SENCILLA Y UNA ALTA DEFINICION EN LA FOTOGRAFIA, COMPACTA Y ARGONOMICAMENTE PERFECTA... EXCELENTE PRECIO, MEJOR QUE LA SONY CYBER

Reviews.Title: Not Good
Reviews.Author: Santa Cruz Buyer
Reviews.Content: I just received the camera from Amazon this weekend and I used it on Saturday and Sunday. The pictures are clear, especially the night shots, but the camera does not allow me to erase pics after I download them to PC. I think it is a defective product. I have to return it today (Monday). I am going to give it another try to replace with the same model. If I still have the same problem, I will have to look for the other models.

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: Fiendship Fun
Reviews.Content: This camera has few redeeming qualities- despite it's advertised 12 megapixels, it's useless whenever this camera struggles to stabilize for a shot. I don't have epilepsy but half of the photos I take suggests so. The photo has tragically yellow tones regardless of whether its indoors with ambient lighting or natural lighting. I have been a lifelong photograph enthusiast and this by far is the worst camera I've ever worked with - I've had better luck with point and shoot film cameras that couldn't have been more than 50 bucks. Half of your photos will be wobbly and yellow.I thought it was the cheaper version of the Nikon Coolpix S220, which I enjoyed for a low budget digital. Crap, crap, crap. don't try to save the 20 dollars.I guess if you have a stand and photoshop to make up for these crap qualities I'm sure you'd get around it, otherwise there are better cameras in its price range.Two stars because I think I've been able to take at least ten good shots within a year I've owned it so it works sometimes...?

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the price
Reviews.Author: larry
Reviews.Content: Have owned several Nikon cameras over the last 30 years-from SLR with all the lenses to point and shoot.  Also have used Olympus and Cannon cameras.At 12 mega pix,, video capability, and some manual overides, this was a good value.  Minor problem-this camera weighs more than I thought it would; but still great to put in pocket and take on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Ehh
Reviews.Author: summerbaby
Reviews.Content: Not so easy to snap quick pics with... seems to take forever to focus, and if you rush it, comes out really blurry. But it is incredibly easy to upload to your computer, so that's a plus. I hear the upgraded version of Coolpix is much much better.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Neha
Reviews.Content: Camera is defective. The press button with which we click the pics, is not working.now camera is in India and I cannot use warrenty also.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: tuckerhbox
Reviews.Content: Searched for cameras in my price range for a few days, looking at reviews, particularly on Amazon.  Decided this camera looked like a good deal.  It is very user friendly BUT takes too long to take a photo and also too long switching from camera to video.  Also, after 4 months, the battery cover did not work anymore and the batteries kept flying out so have to keep it taped up.Overall very disappointed and did not realize Amazon only gave a 30 day warranty. I regularly order from Amazon but will think twice in the future.

Reviews.Title: A Disappointment
Reviews.Author: StrawberryJoe
Reviews.Content: I did not buy this camera from Amazon, I bought it as a package deal from Costco, which included camera, case, and 2GD SD card.  The case was a piece of junk, and the flash RAM was overpriced.  The total price would have been lower through Amazon, but Costco gives an additional 2-year warranty.  The main attraction for me was the fact that this camera DOES use AA batteries, which are cheap, readily available, and easily replaced in the field. Having used Nikon film cameras for over 30 years, I thought that the L22 would measure up to Nikon's high standards, but not quite so.  About ½ half of the shots are blurry, for no apparent reason, and with no discernable pattern.  Multiple immediate, exposures of the same subject on the same spot produced in- and out-of-focus images.  I contacted Nikon support via their web page and was instructed to send them the files for them to check.  However, after reading many reports from other owners of the same problem with this camera and other Nikon digital point-and-shoot cameras, I have decided to return it to Costco for a refund.  I plan to replace it with a Casio digital.

Reviews.Title: NIKON COOLPIX L22
Reviews.Author: al-bzari
Reviews.Content: UNA BUENA CAMARA. AQUI YO COMETI UN ERROR POR EL DINERO QUE PAGUE MAS UN POCO MAS OBTUBE UNA CAMARA NIKON, AQUI MISMO EN AMAZON, CON CARACTERISTICAS MEJORES Y MAS AVANZADA, MI SUGERENCIA ES LEER BIEN ANTES DE COMPRAR. AHORA TENGO DOS CAMARAS NIKON UNA L22 Y LA S3000 RECOMIENDO LA S3000 NO NECESITAS DE PILAS SECAS, YA QUE TRAE SU PILA RECARGABLE Y MAS FUNCIONES QUE LA L22 AUNQUE ES BUENA CAMARA TAMBIEN PERO POR UNOS 10 DOLARES MAS OBTINES ALGO MUCHO MEJOR (NIKON S3000)

Reviews.Title: Best little camera I've ever had!
