Reviews.Author: Gammerfran
Reviews.Content: Previously, I had a Kodak Z740. I got tired of my "little" (not so) camera eating up batteries. Plus, it fit ON my purse, not IN it. Then the photo quality was poor when I tried to enlarge photos even a little.My new Nikon was under the tree for me Christmas morning. I put batteries in it and immediately started using it. I read the manual later; but, truly, this camera is intuitive - VERY user friendly. (And it fits in my purse or my husbands shirt pocket!)I recommend this camera to anyone who wants quality pictures, ease of use, and a camera that will travel well with you. Also, you can have prints enlarged to 16" X 20" and maintain good quality. I haven't tried that yet - but everything else stated about the camera has proven to be true.PS - the red one looks classy!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix digital camera
Reviews.Author: LM
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived before Christmas, which I was thrilled about. I needed it to take pictures of my kids and family.It's a great little camera for the price. I bought it because of the good reviews I read about it!

Reviews.Title: Greatest Camera I Ever Used!
Reviews.Author: Jack Spratt "Bill"
Reviews.Content: This is a brilliant camera! It is very easy to use. I can get a perfectly clear picture. There are different modes on the Nikkon Coolpix L22. Some examples are sports mode, easy auto mode, video mode, ( which has great sound ) and many more! This is a very good camera, and if you are looking for a camera for, young, old, middle aged, any age at all, this is the camera for you! I recomend this amazing camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Martian Man
Reviews.Content: Everything seems to work well.. I bought this camera for my daughter and she loves it. As far as I know (I tried the camera out) it's a good camera, I like the wide screen on it most of all, better than the one I have!

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: altors
Reviews.Content: much better than i expected from reading other reviews excellent camera must say im an amateur though. One draw back consumes batteries wish i had rechargeable batteries.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and Good
Reviews.Author: Yinzhi Cao
Reviews.Content: Cheap price. Easy to use. High resolution. Worth the price.However, it is not appropriate for indoor and night. There is no MEGA O.I.S. You can reduce time of exposure but it is still not quite good.

Reviews.Title: Nice Nilon
Reviews.Author: Jerrold Wharton
Reviews.Content: You can't beat this camera for the money!  I paid $80 with free shipping.  It does tend to over expose a little with the flash but that is easy to fix with the exposure compansation settings.  The videos are not HD 19/9 but it does a good job for facebook or you tube.  I can take 25 minutes of video with a 32gig card. But this camera is not made for video it was just an add on. Use the camera to take point and shoot pictures.  I love slr's but can't afford a digital one at this time.  This camera will fill in until I upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22 Camera
Reviews.Author: Penny S. Fredrickson "Flametop"
Reviews.Content: I am just thrilled with my new camera!  We started taking pictures right away and they came out great.  I wanted something small and compact to take along every day so I wouldn't miss the best shots.  The Coolpix is just what I wanted with the dependability of the Nikon name.  I will be getting rechargeable batteries however, the camera uses them up rapidly.

Reviews.Title: Easy To Use
Reviews.Author: K. Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a present for my neice for Christmas.  It is easy to use and she has taken several great photos with it already.  It is a camera that can definitley grow with her as she learns the features better and is able to learn to take photos is all lighting etc.

Reviews.Title: Cameraphobes Unite
Reviews.Author: ward "Jesse Lee Lovingood"
Reviews.Content: Wouldn't it be wonderful if we could all take pictures easily?  Well, I just don't have the gift.  At all.  I'm on my fifth camera--three digital, one film, and one I never could figure out.  This one is mahvelous.  I take pictures I'm not afraid or ashamed to share.  I even took a self-portrait that I put on my Facebook page.  Phenomenal.  Everything about this camera is almost self-explanatory and that which (gotta call it like it is) dummies like I can't get without help is explained in the booklet.  Goody.  Thanks for this little, easy-to-use camera.  Hope I don't drop it in the toilet like I do the cell phones.  It is Nikon Coolpix L22 12.0MP Digital Camera with 3.6x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22 Digital camera
Reviews.Author: Mary G.
Reviews.Content: I have only had the camera for a few weeks and need to further my knowledge of it. I was not real satified with the indoor pictures taken recently at night with the flash. Some of the background had a reddish tint to it. Indoor pictures taken during the day were great. Also outdoor pictures were very good.  Had a viewfinder on previous camera, so am getting use to just using the screen. All in all, I am pretty satified with this camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Grateful to Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: jimbodambit
Reviews.Content: After purchasing the Nikon L-22 for a friend as a Christmas gift, I only then began to do true research on compact cameras. I returned the L-22 after finding NO monitor for battery power available. I thought I could adapt to the absence of a lithium battery, and become the shopper for a pack of rechargables, but NOT KNOWING where I stand on battery power is unacceptable to me. Many retailers refuse the return of electronic items. but amazon made it easy, and is the on line retailer of the camera which I now want IN BLUE, the panasonic lumix ZS7.

Reviews.Title: great camera for my kids
Reviews.Author: J. H "jh333"
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use; wonderful video ability. Photos were of good quality (slightly pixelated) but for the money it is worth it! This camera was givenfor my 8 year old daughter to use. It is very easy for her to take it along with her wherever she goes and still get good photos from it. Now, it is not a camerathat you want to take to a wedding or something where priceless photos will be taken, but for our purposes, it is good.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Walt Bieganski
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures and was very competetively priced. It has one drawback - the camera is not rechargeable, so you have to change the batteries or buy rechargeable batteries and a charger.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22 Camera
Reviews.Author: Deb from Texas
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Nikon L22 Camera for a Christmas present to my son.  He loves it!  It is a great little camera for the price.  It has great features and so easy to use.  It takes awesome pictures and can do just about everything.  There are smaller, more powerful cameras, but this one works perfectly for us.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera, but not the best
Reviews.Author: dmanr1
Reviews.Content: I got this camera and was disappointed that it took regular old AA batteries, nothing rechargeable. Also, the camera seemed a little bigger than I thought it would. It seemed ok, but I decided to send it back and get the next model up, the S3000, for ten bucks more. I received the S3000 today and couldn't be happier. It has a rechargeable camera battery and is a lot sleeker than the L22.

Reviews.Title: deceiving info
Reviews.Author: djf
Reviews.Content: I have no problem with the Nikon Coolpix but what was included with the product was deceiving.  It stated that the memory card would be included but it was not.

Reviews.Title: Good price/quality for an easy-to-use point-and-shoot!
Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: This Nikon does not have all of the features one might hope for in a digital camera, but for the easy to use camera that it is everything is set up well. Image quality is pristine in most lighting and it's compact design makes it easy to carry everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22
Reviews.Author: photobuff
Reviews.Content: I'm having trouble with this camera.  It came without a manual in the box.  I had purchased one I thought was just like it last year and loved it.  The pictures I've taken so far have not been as clear, with part of them having a yellow tinge.  I'm having trouble deleting pictures.  It was easy with the previous cool pix camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: jcl
Reviews.Content: I bought one for my wife in November. She liked it so much we bought one for my daughter for Christmas. I like the use of regular batteries. Pictures are very clear. It's a pretty simple camera that works when you want it to.

Reviews.Title: Unreliable - Inconsistent
Reviews.Author: snav "snav"
Reviews.Content: Sorry I bought this camera.  Wanted an inexpensive digital point and shoot and I thought this fit the bill.  But I am not happy with it at all.  The lighting is all messed up and lately - only 6 months after buying it - the auto focus is not consistent.  One too many times my favorite shot came out unfocused.  I guess you get what you pay for.  I am going to buy a better quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding camera!
Reviews.Author: countrycraftwoman
Reviews.Content: For the $$ this is an outstanding camera! I love the viewfinder and how crisp and clear the pictures turn out!!! I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants a great camera at an extremely reasonable price!

Reviews.Title: seems to work well
Reviews.Author: Nancy Luther
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera refurbished with a 90 day warantee as a present I haven't had any complaints from her. We'll wait for the 90th day.  ;)

Reviews.Title: Great Bargain!
Reviews.Author: Natalie Luke
Reviews.Content: This camera is affordable, easy to use and takes great pictures!  A great deal!

Reviews.Title: The best in its class !!!
Reviews.Author: M. Khalil "MarkKh"
Reviews.Content: Great camera for its price. nice, clear images. very close to professional. excellent price and very decent features. Really a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Don't ever buy this type of camera!!!
Reviews.Author: asianthornbird
Reviews.Content: I got the product fast from the seller, however the quality was not good, after I used only couple time the case where to put the battery was already torn, I could not close my case at all, I was about to returned but it was only $99 dollars so forget about it because it was more than 3 months and it costs more to ship back.  NOT RECOMMEND to order this type of camera at all!!!Nikon Coolpix L22 12.0MP Digital Camera with 3.6x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red-primary)

Reviews.Title: Not a techy, LOVE THE AUTO MODE!
Reviews.Author: GypsyKat
Reviews.Content: This camera I purchased for a friend who does not like any technical stuff as she says.  Though she loves the ease of the auto mode and is very happy with the item.  Delivery took a little longer than I wanted it to take but since my friend loves the camera I will forgive that part :)

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pictures but goes to sleep to fast.
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: For the price the photos are beautiful.  I tend to use disposable batteries because they're easier to manage when planning a day of shooting the camera.  The ONLY thing I do not like about this camera is that it goes into "sleep" mode too quickly.  I've missed many, many shots by raising the camera to point and shoot only to have to half-press the shutter button to wake the camera up, only to have missed the good shot.  I use this camera mostly for photos of my young grandson, on the job, as well as the movie clip feature.  I plan to replace this camera with the same one whenever I need to but it bugs me when the camera snoozes on me.

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: patronta
Reviews.Content: good for the money.  still shots can be blurry if not focused for a second.  not like the 35mm, but clarity is sufficient.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Emory E. Bullard II
Reviews.Content: The 3" view screen is the best. Very easy to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: coolpix s3000
Reviews.Author: Clay Quinn
Reviews.Content: this is a neat camera. small enough for any pocket. easy operation and quality photos. the company I purchased it from through amazon gave super fast delivery. the reviews I read on amazon were very informative. I bought it for less then sams club sold it for!

Reviews.Title: A bonafide piece of junk
Reviews.Author: J-Sto
Reviews.Content: Bought as a Christmas gift for my daughter and the LCD screen is now a plethora of rainbow colors.  Not that the screen is all that important.  It lasted all of ONE MONTH.  Now we will see how honorable Nikon is with their warranty.Forgot to update when I received my reply from Nikon.  Nikon quoted $100 to repair a camera that was under $80 NEW.  The reason for rejection "Severe misuse and abuse"  Mind you, the camera failed after one month.  There is not one scratch on the camera nor was it "abused".  I believe that is Nikon's excuse for not honoring warranties.  I don't know about you but I have to believe an abused electronic item would actually show signs of abuse.  But hey what do I know? Buyer Beware and I WILL NEVER purchase a Nikon product again.

Reviews.Title: Mostly great
Reviews.Author: Bradley B. Anderson "Bugsley"
Reviews.Content: I got the camera for a Christmas gift for my wife.  Nothing in the material indicated that it would require a memory card, let alone what size or type of card it required, so the pictures I had hoped to take are not.  A new camera with a memory card, batteries and other items come as a package at Costco for $99, which would have been about the same cost as this refurbished camera after purchasing the extras.  On the plus side, it is a Nikon and it is a very reliable camera, so far.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Madscientist "lcjr2002"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera for the price. We paid $89 from Amazon delivered to our house door. When you rate a product or service, you have to consider both the cost and what you get. You don't always get what you pay for. For the price we paid for it, this camera far exceeded our expectations. The pictures are of great quality, especially outdoors. We have taken some stunning photos with this camera. The performance of this camera in low light conditions is not very good but that is expected for cameras in this price range. However, you can improve the quality of images considerably if you forget about the easy auto mode in this camera. It works very poorly and pictures are often blurry. If you don't use the easy auto mode and make some manual adjustments in the settings, the pictures are excellent even in low light. Wife and I took over 1,000 pictures recently during our vacation and we did not get a single blurry image after making the adjustments I mentioned previously. Again, the easy auto mode works very poorly and pictures often come out blurry. If you change the settings in the camera and make manual adjustments, the pictures come out great. This camera also shoots standard quality video. I highly recommend this camera if you can get a very good deal on it. It is worth it even if you consider its flaws. The manual is helpful in guiding you through the different manual settings. Overall, we rate this product 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22 12.0 MP Camera Purchase and Delivery
Reviews.Author: Mary C. Blackmon
Reviews.Content: This camera took much too long to be delivered (more than two weeks) while I sat around unable to take photos.  Now that I have it, I am happy with the photos it takes, and with the videos.  However, I would have appreciated receiving an SP memory card with the camera, or at least the info that I would need to purchase an SD card.  I also didn't know I'd need two AA batteries.  I assumed the camera had a lithium battery, as the last two digital cameras I've purchased had a lithium rechargeable battery.  When I set the date and time, I inadvertently mashed "OK" when the date was on 2009, now my photos will always be one year older than real time.In short, I waited too long for the camera to be delivered, then had to go out and buy an SD card and AA batteries, then carry spare AA batteries around with me, and I can't figure out how to change the date.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L22 pocket camera
Reviews.Author: J. Wilson "coffee rich"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price.  Fast, easy, good photos all the time. Nice complete easy to use photo slection menu and auto focus feature. My wife loves the camera but for her the favorite feature is it's red color.

Reviews.Title: Its name suits it perfectly
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Browning "Sharon"
Reviews.Content: I took the camera to the botanical gardens and got some beautiful pictures.  It's a perfect size to carry in my purse.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Seems to work fine.
Reviews.Author: the panda
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace our Canon PowerShot A520 which stopped holding a battery charge for more than a couple of pictures. It was a few years old, but didn't really think of it as disposable so disappointed. Hopefully this Nikon will last longer. It's much thinner than the PowerShot, which is nice. Easy to slip in a large pocket or purse.

Reviews.Title: Blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I got one of these for Christmas, and every picture comes out blurry.  I have tried every different setting on the camera, but nothing helps.  The 5mp camera on my phone takes much better pictures.

Reviews.Title: I'm So Nikon
Reviews.Author: Jolia
Reviews.Content: I'm So Nikon UserI Was Have Coolpix L15 , But The Lens Broke So I Ask 4 Fix It But They Said It Will Cost 132.74 $So My Mom Said Buy New One& I Choose This One I Love Blue SOOOOO MuchSo I Order This One Without Tax & Ship .. I Was Lucky :DBut I Have a 1 problem if i want to take a photo without flash Shaking not all the time but most .. but i guess i will find the Solution Soon :)So Buy This Camera It The BEST + I Guess All Nikon Camera Easy To USE :D

Reviews.Title: *******DO NOT BUY*******
Reviews.Author: Angela "Ms A"
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!!! Should be a way to put NO STARS!!! This camera broke after two months use.  The shutter will not operate properly.  It was used three times, not even enough times to fill the memory card.  The seller REFUSES to do anything about it, and gave me the run around in email for TWO WEEKS!!! Amazon also refuses to do anything about it. DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY

Reviews.Title: Don't buy!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: NTG
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for 9 y/o son for Xmas 2010 he only used it twice and the batteries were dead. The picture quality is horrible all of the pictures come out blurry.  This camera is a piece of JUNK!!!!! I will never by any products from nikon again!!!!

Reviews.Title: Include memory
Reviews.Author: JORGE A. RODRIGUEZ MORENO
Reviews.Content: The product is good. The problem is for the new user in camara or using Amazon dont know the camara need buy a memory out of the initial buying. The recomendation is include that for the new users dont have a the same mistake.

Reviews.Title: I gave this as a gift
Reviews.Author: Mr helpful "JJG"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my oldest daughter. She told me she read the direction and watched the video and feels that she know how to work the camera. Her old camera gave up the ship  so she needed a new camera for her trip to Hi.  I like that this camera is easy to use, and that the direction are easy to follow.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: Like that it is so close in design to my earlier model that was the in teh same style.  Easy to use adn takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: pretty good overall
Reviews.Author: concerned mom
Reviews.Content: We got this camera as a Christmas present for our family bc we've been wanting a nice and compact camera that would take fairly decent pictures and not take too much time playing with settings.  We really like the camera for these aspects.  The only issue I've had w/ photo quality is that sometimes the camera will decide not to use the flash for you, and I don't like this feature.  I'd prefer to choose whether or not I want the flash.  It's not that I can't choose this option myself, but I have to change settings when I'm trying to take a picture sometimes, which is just a little annoying, but happens rarely.  The video quality is decent, not great, but I don't really expect it to be more than that from a small relatively cheap camera.As for durability, I didn't give it a high rating bc we haven't had it that long so I don't feel like I really know yet.  We did have one incident in which I placed the camera on the floor while the lense was going back in.  I didn't realize it hadn't gone in yet, and the lense got stuck.  At that point we thought I had just broken a brand new camera.  Thankfully we were able to fix it and I have been more careful.  Another thing about durability w/ this camera is that it's plastic.  I'm sure it will get some scratches eventually, but that doesn't necessarily mean it's not durable.I only gave 3 stars for delivery bc it came a day late.  That's not too bad, but if they tell you the camera's coming on Wed. and you dont' get it, you start to wonder if someone may have stolen it.  Also since it was delivered by the USPS, I was a little more concerned about whether it got stolen.  However I know they can be slow so I gave it the next day and the camera came.  It was perfect in the packaging - no damage - and everything seemed as it was placed in the package from the factory.Overall, we give this camera 2 thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: klmdvm32
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift. Hasn't been used much yet, but my mother-in-law thinks it is very user friendly and loves the larger LCD screen.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: IACA Photo
Reviews.Content: Was to be a replacement for my Sony DCS-S49 around the house camera as I like a AA battery camera for this function. No matter what type of AA battery I use after about 5 to 6 shots I get the dreaded blue screen message Battery Exhausted. Move the batteries around, play with the compartment door, let it set for about an hour and can get another few pictures. For the price I paid and the opportunity cost involved to returning it, into the trash and never to buy Nikon again. Back to the industry leader IMO Canon. Does the term JUNK come to mind for Nikon?

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Pedro Acosta
Reviews.Content: Good product, need to specify they're need rechargable batteries on the description and maybe offer include as a combo offert.

Reviews.Title: defective
Reviews.Author: evie
Reviews.Content: how unfortunate, the silver nikon i received was defective. the shutter button was impossibly hard to press and the zoom only worked if you turned the camera on and off several times. the good news is amazon is sending a replacement overnight and i will update my review. we already own one of these easy to use cameras in red and love it. reasonable battery life with lithium batteries, decent pictures and videos.

Reviews.Title: Broken Zoom in under Two months
Reviews.Author: Cherene Zito
Reviews.Content: Zoom feature broke and I am having a really hard time returning this to be fixed under it's warranty. It appears you have to have a printer or access to one to print a return label. I do not have one, so I am sending it back (by USPS) with a hand written return label, as told I could after 5 times on the phone. I ordered this online due to the fact it's a 50 mile drive to get to a major town. Thus driving now 50 miles to get a printed out return label just seems silly. We are not all home offices and I find it a real inconvenience the store I purchased it from threw Amazon is also not helping (they also want a printed receipt. So if you buy something online,,, make note... If it breaks, you better have a printer so you can return it.Very disappointed and stil with no working camera.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix ..cool price
Reviews.Author: Jakey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model as a "point n shoot" for my Fiance...It is so much better than that, and for the price you can't beat it.It has all of the attributes that you would expect from a Nikon...You'll love it.

Reviews.Title: Lousy performance by seller and Amazon
Reviews.Author: Hansenigloo
Reviews.Content: The seller did send the product promptly, however they instructed the delivery service to get a signature. Since there is no one home when the delivery service comes this created delay in receipt of the camera by the customer. In the end the customer had to go pick up the camera, a really big inconvenience, which should require the seller to refund the shipping fee. Ha, good luck with that one.The batteries the seller provided with the camera were dead, dead, dead, not an ounce of juice.A very highly unsatisfactory experience with Amazon and the seller, worst I have ever had, bad, bad, bad.Then Amazon forgets to send me anything to rate the seller and I have to complain to get anything. Amazon bad service, bad, bad, bad.Barry Hansen

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Mystic
Reviews.Content: I searched thru a ton of cameras options looking for three specific features: a self-timer, AA batteries, and an AV cable to plug directly in to a TV.  This was going to be a gift and these were the three key features the receiver of the gift wanted.  This one was one of the few that claimed to have all three. Despite saying it did.....THIS DOES NOT COME WITH AV CABLES!!  USB cables - yes.  AV cables - no!  I ended up making a separate purchase for the AV cables rather than wasting time trying to fight with the seller.  Imagine my disappointment when the gift was opened in front of me to find no AV cables!!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: esco
Reviews.Content: This camera was inexpensive, but definitely not a deal.  The flash worked only intermittently and it took forever to get ready for additional pictures once one was taken.  By the time the flash and everything was ready, the moment had passed.  This happened to us repeatedly so we returned the camera.

Reviews.Title: No Better than my previous Digital Camera, Deletes Pictures Before Processing
Reviews.Author: mmd4tj "dina1694"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera through Amazon and was thrilled to get such prompt delivery on this beautiful little red digital camera.  I had ordered the camera thinking it would be simple to operate and would take better pictures than my previous digital camera.  Although the zoom was stronger and more megapixels, taking pictures from a distance is still very disappointing.  When trying to enlarge the pictures to print, they become fuzzy and a waste to process.On Veterans Day, I had taken quite a number of parade pictures and proceeded to download to my computer.  I had some older pictures on the memory card which had already been successfully downloaded to my computer. I was able to view all the new pictures I had taken on the camera, but when I plugged in the USB cable, no pictures would download except for the older pictures, about 15, which were still on the camera.  I called technical support about the issue, and he told me to take the memory card to a local store to process.  I did this, but the pictures were no longer on the memory card as the rep assured me they would be.  Somehow, the camera must have deleted all the important pictures I had taken.  This was very distressing to lose all my pictures.Also, the battery cover is extremely difficult to close.  What I had hoped for in a simple to use camera is a total disappointment with this Nikon. Included with the camera was a minimal instruction manual. A more complete instruction manual was in the form of an instruction CD that could be downloaded to the computer for reference.  This is totally unacceptable.  I questioned the tech support about this and he said it is part of the going green initiative not to send a printed version.This camera is a total puzzle to me as I have never had a digital camera that deleted pictures without my intentionally deleting them.  I am very distressed with this beautiful little camera, and hope that Amazon will allow a return on it.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix l22
Reviews.Author: reviewer "hf"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera.  Simple to use.  Takes great pix.  Red is a nice color.

Reviews.Title: Impressed!
Reviews.Author: Margie
Reviews.Content: Nikon Coolpix L22 12.0MP Digital Camera with 3.6x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red-primary)This product was delivered much faster than I anticipated. I was expecting to get this in a week. I ordered this On 12/4 (estimated delivery date was 12/9-12/14). I tested the camera and was amazed by the carity in the pictures & video quality. It's a bit bulky yet small. Definately Sturdy. I can't wait to take all the christmas pictures with my family and friends.  Beach Camera really impressed me with their timely delivery!!

Reviews.Title: i wouldnt say it ruined xmas but........
Reviews.Author: josh b
Reviews.Content: first of all this thing did not work out of the box with the card amazon included with it.it would say "cannot read card" as soon as you took a picture.later,i stuck an extra memory card in the camera,and it corrupted it! losing my daughter's christmas recital in the process.it bums me out as it looked like it took pretty snazzy pictures.i'll never buy a nikon again.i guess it's back to the trusty 7 year old olympus camera this was meant to replace.

Reviews.Title: GRAN CAMARA
Reviews.Author: Carlos J. Salazar Figueredo
Reviews.Content: GRAN CAMARA, FACIL DE USAR, GRAN CALIDAD DE FOTOS Y RAPIDO DISPARO PARA LAS FOTOS. LO RECOMIENDO, ADEMAS ES UNA NIKON.

Reviews.Title: nikon cool pix
Reviews.Author: Kettra Johnson
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gft for my niece. she loved it and after seeing the camera, I think I want one

Reviews.Title: used  camera
Reviews.Author: GayLord
Reviews.Content: well the product functionality is ok but it has deep scratch in where the COOLPIX is written very evident. So it would only means if its used it has a cosmetic damage?!  Lesson Learned.

Reviews.Title: It takes AA batteries
Reviews.Author: Alexandra
Reviews.Content: This item was a gift for my mother. She received it and told me it required AA batteries. I didn't even know they still made cameras that required AA batteries instead of rechargeable lithium ones. I told her to return it and that is how my brief affair with Nikon ended. I am going back to Canon.

Reviews.Title: No memory card
Reviews.Author: Scott A. Grant
Reviews.Content: Really dumb.  There is no memory card, not even a basic one.  So now I need to buy that as well.  So either Nikon doesn't include one, or this is a retuned/refurb camera sold as new by Amazon.  Either way, really dumb.  Merry Christmas, Mom, sorry your camera doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Had this camera for a month before it started randomly switching modes. Probably my own fault for not doing enough research before purchasing such a poorly made product.

Reviews.Title: Displeased over shipping , daughter loves camera.
Reviews.Author: Be
Reviews.Content: I ordered this on Labor Day Weekend, and in less than a minute changed my mind over 3-5 day free shipping. but was charged for normal shipping.  This was not fair and really upset me.  It maybe a while before I order again!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Terrible Shipping
Reviews.Author: Lyosion
Reviews.Content: Shipping is horrible! Amazon said my camera would be here by thursday. It is wednesday and it did not even ship yet. If you are going to buy this item, make sure you do it early.

Reviews.Title: ultimate craop
Reviews.Author: mzeina
Reviews.Content: takes forever to focus, battery eater. worst camera i ever ran into. it's in working order but i will dispose it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Where is the free 2gb card?
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Morales
Reviews.Content: I purchased this silver model because I was to recieve a FREE 2 gb memory card. I did not receive that nor did I receive the card I asked for because this was marked as a gift. Please advise....

Reviews.Title: A painting would provide better motion capture
Reviews.Author: D. Lawson
Reviews.Content: This camera works about as well as throwing paint on everyone you want a photo of and throwing them face first into a piece of white particle board. The shambles of splintery wood, paint, and blood would provide a more detailed account of what you were trying to convey with your picture than if you had picked this camera and tried to use it.I'm pretty sure Nicéphore Niépce came up with this camera around 1720 and but decidedly passed it up in favor of wooden box, filament, and a black cloth.
